span.span: Represents the table drawn by the control at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件以网格的形式显示数据。The control displays data in the form of a grid. 是仅表示所绘制的网格的类。The is a class that represents the drawn grid only. 不应将此网格与类混淆 ，该类是网格的可能的数据源。This grid should not be confused with the class, which is a possible source of data for the grid. 相反， 严格表示在控件中绘制的网格。Instead, the strictly represents the grid as it is painted in the control. 因此，通过， 您可以控制每个的网格的外观 。Therefore, through the you can control the appearance of the grid for each . 若要指定 显示特定中的数据时使用的 ，请将设置 为 的 。To specify which is used when displaying data from a particular , set the to the of a . 通过属性检索的 包含 控件使用的所有对象 。The retrieved through the property contains all the objects used by a control. 集合可以包含 所需的任意多个对象，但每个对象的都 必须是唯一的。The collection can contain as many objects as you need, however the of each must be unique. 在运行时，这允许你根据 用户的偏好来替换相同数据的不同。At run time, this allows you to substitute a different for the same data, depending on the user's preference. 要执行此操作：To do this: 1. 用对象填充 。Populate the with objects. 如果 中的 属性值与 对象的属性相同，则将 与此一起显示 。If a exists in the whose property value equals the object's property, the is displayed with this . 如果不 存在具有匹配的 ，则 会显示数据网格表的默认样式。If no exists with a matching , the is displayed with the default style for data grid tables. 2. 如果需要不同的网格样式，请使用 `Item` 属性选择适当的 (将 传递 给 属性) 并将返回的对象的设置 为新值。When a different grid style is needed, use the `Item` property to select the appropriate (pass the to the property) and set the of the returned object to a new value. 3. 使用 属性来选择所需的 ，然后将其设置 为的 。Use the property to select the desired , and set its to the of the . > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建 对象并将其添加到中，然后 将 对象添加到中 。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 向 集合添加具有有效值的空值时，将 自动为您生成对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此，如果尝试将 具有重复值的新对象添加到中，将引发异常 。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 若要确定 当前显示的，请使用 的和属性 返回 。To determine which is currently displayed, use the and properties of the to return a . 如果数据源实现了 接口，则可以使用 方法返回 当前表的。If the data source implements the interface, you can use the method to return the of the current table. 下面的 c # 代码对此进行了演示：This is shown in the C# code below: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` 如果 包含 通过 对象相关的对象，并且当前显示的 是子表，则 将以) 最简单的大小写形式返回 RelationName (形式的字符串。If the contains objects related through objects, and the currently displayed is a child table, the will return a string in the form of TableName.RelationName (in the simplest case). 如果在 层次结构中进一步向下，则字符串将包含父表的名称，后跟 到达表级别所需的必需值。If the is further down in the hierarchy, the string will consist of the parent table's name followed by the necessary values required to reach the table's level. 例如，假设有 一个名为 (从上到下的层次结构关系的三个对象) `Regions` 、 `Customers` 、和 `Orders` 两个 名为和的对象 `RegionsToCustomers` `CustomersToOrders` ，则 属性将返回 "CustomersToOrders"。For example, imagine three objects in a hierarchical relationship named (top to bottom) `Regions`, `Customers`, and `Orders`, and two objects named `RegionsToCustomers` and `CustomersToOrders`, the property will return "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders". 但是， 将为 "Orders"。However, the will then be "Orders". 对象的集合 通过 的属性返回 。The collection of objects is returned through the property of the . 当 显示时，的设置 将重写控件的设置 。When a is displayed, the settings for the will override the settings for the control. 如果没有为特定属性设置值，则 将改用该控件的值。If a value is not set for a particular property, the control's value will be used instead. 以下列表显示了 可设置为替代控件属性的属性 ：The following list shows the properties that can be set to override control properties: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要将绑定 到对象的强类型数组，对象类型必须包含公共属性。To bind the to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties. 若要创建 显示数组的，请将属性设置为，其中，将 `typename` `typename` 替换为对象类型的名称。To create a that displays the array, set the property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type. 另请注意， 属性区分大小写; 类型名称必须完全匹配。Also note that the property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly. 有关示例，请参见 属性。See the property for an example. 你还可以将绑定 到 。You can also bind the to an . 的一项功能 是它可以包含多种类型的对象，但 如果列表中的所有项的类型与第一个项的类型相同，则只能绑定到此类列表。A feature of the is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item. 这意味着所有对象的类型必须相同，或者必须从列表中的第一项继承同一个类。This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list. 例如，如果列表中的第一项是 ，则第二项可以是 继承自) 的 ( 。For example, if the first item in a list is a , the second item could be a (which inherits from ). 另一方面，如果第一项为 ，则第二个对象不能为 。If, on the other hand, the first item is a , the second object cannot be a . 此外，当绑定到中的 对象并且中的对象 必须包含公共属性时，必须具有其中的项。Further, the must have items in it when it is bound and the objects in the must contain public properties. 如果为空， 则将生成一个空网格。An empty will result in an empty grid. 绑定到时 ，将的设置 为 "ArrayList" (类型名称) 。When binding to an , set the of the to "ArrayList" (the type name). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建两个 实例，并将 每个对象的设置为 中的的 。The following code example creates two instances and sets the of each object to the of a in a . 然后，该示例将 对象添加到 每个的 。The example then adds objects to the of each . 有关运行的示例，请参阅 示例。For an example that runs, see the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，每个列标题中将出现一个三角形，指示排序的方向。When the property is set to `true`, a triangle appears in each column header indicating the direction of the sort. 用户可以单击任何列标题以按该列对网格进行排序。The user can click on any column header to sort the grid by that column. 再次单击该列将更改排序的方向。Clicking the column a second time changes the direction of the sort. 此属性将重写 属性。This property overrides the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许您 通过单击一个按钮，并在标签中显示当前排序状态，来切换上的排序可用性。The following code example allows you to toggle sorting availability on a by clicking a button and the current sorting status is displayed in a label. 此示例要求具有一个，其中 包含一些数据，一个 位于上 。This example requires that you have a with a that contains some data, a and a on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
